remarks: Inverse of a group sum.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.) (Revised by AV, 6-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzinv.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzinv.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzinv.i $e |- I = ( invg ` G ) $.
gsumzinv.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
gsumzinv.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzinv.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzinv.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzinv.n $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzinv $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( I o. F ) ) = ( I ` ( G gsum F ) ) ) $.
